Introduction
This topic contains information about proposed rating decisions, including
required Disability Rating Activity Site (DRAS) actions upon completion of Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) examinations
considering evidence in proposed rating decisions
addressing claimed and referred conditions in proposed rating decisions
deferring claimed conditions in proposed rating decisions
required information on the
Codesheet
of a proposed rating decision
notification letter to accompany proposed rating decisions
including dependents on the BEL
, and
end product (EP) credit for proposed rating decisions
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section H - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Proposed Ratings
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section H
